Functions
fza_fnc_getSeatVariable
Description

Sets a public but seat-specific variable Defaults to the player's seat, but can be overriden by passing a specific seat name

Parameters
_heli

The helicopter for which the variable is set

_key

The variable to be set

_seat

The seat of the helicopter to set the variable to (default: player seat) can also be "plt" or "cpg"

Returns

...

Examples

[_heli, "fza_ah64_sight"] call fza_fnc_getSeatVariable

Author

mattysmith22
